name: LUUN
description:
LUUN is a crafting survival game set in a beautiful world of mysterious islands.

Planned features:  

  • Build and customize your own boats to sail the seas. 
  • Explore a procedurally generated world for loot, experience and knowledge.
  • Build your base to defend against those that seek to tear down your Totem. 
  • Play to your own unique style with customizable characters, clothing, buildings, tools and weapons.

Features are in heavy development to reach this goal. Read the devlogs below where I outline the latest major features and talk about future plans.  See the Roadmap on Trello for the very latest state of progress. Use the in-game Feedback tool for suggestions and bug reporting.

PC Requirements:
Windows 10  PC (64bit)
4GB RAM
DirectX 11 capable video card with 4GB VRAM. 
1.5GB Drive Space install + ~300MB for each LUUN World generated.

LUUN is built using Unreal Engine to run on a modest gaming PC. Graphics options are available in-game for tuning performance. 

Use the in-game Feedback tool to report gameplay issues. To get help with other problems email support@luungame.com.

Currently LUUN is single-player only, with optional multiplayer coming soon. See the Roadmap and subscribe to the LUUN email list to stay up to date with the latest development.

Thank you so much for checking out LUUN!  You are invited to join in building a new and exciting experience for survival game lovers.  

Click here to sign up on the LUUN email list to get the latest news, and special offers just for email subscribers.

Buy LUUN now to join in early and help make this a great survival experience!
